dare: Send a flirty message to someone you like.
Let someone in the group check your phone gallery for one minute.
Do a sexy dance for one minute.
Text an ex and ask them for a second chance.
Send a voice note saying something naughty to the group.
Let someone else write a text for you and send it to your crush.
Share a story of your most awkward intimate moment.
Act out your favorite romantic scene from a movie using only sounds.
Reveal the most sensitive spot on your body.
Wear your shirt inside out for the next three rounds.
Call a random contact and flirt with them for at least one minute.
Do a body shot (drink) off of someone else in the group or pretend to do so.
Show the last intimate message you received.
Post a spicy status on social media for the next 10 minutes.
Eat something in a sensual manner.
Send a flirty message to the last person you texted.
Change your profile picture to a silly or embarrassing one for the next hour.
Send a voice note saying something cheeky to the group.
Post an embarrassing story about yourself on social media and tag a friend.
Text your crush a random emoji and see how they respond.
Send a screenshot of your browser history (censored as needed) to the group.
Do an online challenge chosen by the group and post the video.
Send a voice note confessing a funny or embarrassing truth.
Post a silly or awkward photo of yourself on social media.
Text a friend and ask them for a ridiculous favor and share their response.
